1.0.13.name: connect20/Ensygnia_Onescan
1.0.13.description: Ensygnia's Onescan Payment Extension allows online market shops to accept mobile payments in just one scan. Visitors no longer have to complete long registration forms or jump through security hoops in a long checkout process. Using their mobile phone, all customers have to do is scan our Onescan padlock using our Onescan app at checkout. With one scan of a padlock and in under 10 seconds payment is securely completed.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
